TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1271
TEI.2.document_title: Daniel E. Bayles to Stephen F. Austin, 03-02-1826

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1271

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Receipt for wages.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Col Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To *person_mentioned*D Bayless*/person_mentioned* Dr.*/p*
*p*To 13 days Services on the *location_mentioned*Galveston*/location_mentioned* Trip as a *person_mentioned*hand */person_mentioned**location_mentioned*on board the Mexican*/location_mentioned* at 1$ in Trade pr. day_____________________________________$13.00*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*S F de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="03-02-1826">March 2 1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*Recd Payment *person_mentioned*Danl. E. Bayles*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
